alert.note: Alert for Hemphill (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:08PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lipscomb, northeastern Roberts, northwestern Hemphill and southeastern Ochiltree Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 407 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles south of Wolf Creek Park, or 21 miles north of Miami, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glazier and Wolf Creek Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
